title: Is it possible to have feelings for someone for a very long time even though you have never had a real conversation with that person? - Quora

response.answer_text: As long as you realize that your in love with an imaginary person, yes. I have had many friends who would chase after a girl, pine after her for months and years even and then, as soon as they talked to her and got to know her a little, they stopped being “in love” and most times didn't even like her anymore. Those friends are rude, selfish people - they put someone on a pedestal without knowing them and then throw them aside as soon as they get to know reality.
seeing as you never had a real conversation with that person, there’s a mystery element involved that may disappear once you got to know that person
